greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) by rows: coefficient [x^(n-k)] of 2^n * n! *L(n,1/2,x), with L the generalized Laguerre polynomials in the Abramowitz-Stegun normalization.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
R. J. Mathar, Gauss-Laguerre and Gauss-Hermite quadrature on 64, 96 and 128 nodes, viXra:1303.0013, Section 3.
mathematica: Table[Reverse[Table[2^n*(-1)^k*n!/k!*Binomial[n + 1/2, n - k], {k, 0, n}]], {n, 0, 7}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 05 2013 *)
xref: Columns include (-1)^n times A000079, n/2*A014480. Diagonals include A001147, -A000906, 4*A001881.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 15 2004
